articles.title: World’s richest people add billions to their names - PerthNow
articles.description: Nine Americans and one French businessman make up the list of the world's 10 richest people, who all added billions to their bank accounts in 2021. SEE THE LIST.
articles.content:
The 10 richest people in the world added 400 billion US dollars to their already enormous fortunes in 2021.
The biggest gainer was Elon Musk, who started the year with a net worth of 156 billion dol… [+2756 chars]

articles.title: Security expert weighs in on Mall of America's response to Friday night's shooting - KARE11.com
